| Element | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`<html>`](/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/html "The HTML <html> element (or HTML root element) represents the root of an HTML document. All other elements must be descendants of this element.") | The **HTML `<html>` element** (or _HTML root element_) represents the root of an HTML document. All other elements must be descendants of this element. |
